name: Grido
body:
![Screen](http://img.bugyik.cz/Grido.png)

### Requires
[Nette Framework 2.0](http://nette.org)

### Install
Download and extract to libs dir or use [Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/o5/grido) with [Composer](http://getcomposer.org/).

### Links
* [Documentation (CS)](http://addons.nette.org/grido/)
* [Example](https://github.com/o5/grido/example/)
* [API](http://grido.bugyik.cz/api/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
